Definition: Average of the absolute value of the regression error
Average of the absolute value of the regression error (in % of actual value)
Average of the squares of the errors
Square root of the average of the squares of the errors
Square root of the average of the squares of the natural log of the errors
Square root of the average of the squares of the percentage of the errors
Correlation coefficient between the actual and predicted values
Percentage of variance explained by the predictors
